channel.title: I have a Slate GL-Net Router, Downloaded Speedify - now What?
channel.description:
Newbie, Got file, downloaded the file onto my Slate Ax Router, now I can not connect to my Router. Connects actually but says no Internet. I look for the WiFi SmoothWAN Setup but also not there. I thought was next step. Not sure what to do?
Steps I took: Router on, PC signed into GL 5G wifi from router. On PC went to router webpage address and under upgrades downloaded and brought over file to install. I did hit Keep settings - (Maybe my issue) It installed, once done no access to that webpage address any longer, and no wifi to select called SmoothWan. My Router wifi shows up still, I connect but no interent?
Any help would be great.
Thanks,
Brandon

item.title: I have a Slate GL-Net Router, Downloaded Speedify - now What?
item.dc:creator: TalalM
item.description:
Hold the reset button for 10 seconds then release, it should reset shortly after, should be ready in 2 minutes.

If that didnâ€™t work here is the restore procedure: Debrick via Uboot - GL.iNet Router Docs 4
Keep settings is a problem when mixing different firmware.

Read full topic
item.source: I have a Slate GL-Net Router, Downloaded Speedify - now What?

item.title: I have a Slate GL-Net Router, Downloaded Speedify - now What?
item.dc:creator: Jax5er
item.description:
Newbie, Got file, downloaded the file onto my Slate Ax Router, now I can not connect to my Router. Connects actually but says no Internet. I look for the WiFi SmoothWAN Setup but also not there. I thought was next step. Not sure what to do?

Steps I took:
Router on, PC signed into GL 5G wifi from router. On PC went to router webpage address and under upgrades downloaded and brought over file to install. I did hit Keep settings - (Maybe my issue) It installed, once done no access to that webpage address any longer, and no wifi to select called SmoothWan. My Router wifi shows up still, I connect but no interent?

Any help would be great.

Thanks,

Brandon
